column1: When most people talk about the arthritis in their knees, they are referring to a type of arthritis called osteoarthritis.
An unloading brace does not cure your arthritis.
But it may help relieve symptoms such as knee pain or buckling when you move around.
People who want to delay having knee replacement surgery may want to try using unloading braces.
Some people say they have fewer symptoms when they use them.
